channel.title: Update on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Update on Home

item.title: Update 7.6*
item.description: Preliminary stats This page list statistics of battles fought during 7.6 so far. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not career stats unless otherwise mentioned.

item.title: Update 7.5
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought during 7.5. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not career stats unless otherwise mentioned. In total, there were 452M battles by 610k players recorded.
